bug.author: aleksei-ai
bug.summary: SentenceDetectorModel fills incorrect begin and end in annotation
bug.description:
SentenceDetectorModel returns incorrect begin and end of sentence starting from the second sentence in the document. For example: "Hello World!! New Sentence" <denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
